Text.Page:
In this part of Raga Evala, the argons were doing some sort of strange botanical research. They gathered, and apparently argonized, some faeriesâ€”probably for their close connection to the natural world.

You could never get me to harm a faerie creature in the real world, but in here everything's backward and upside-down.

Can you obtain the horns of the argonomorph jalmaraks? Maybe I can come up with some sort of cure for argonification.

This kind of research isn't easy, and it's not exactly the safest laboratory I've ever worked in.

Still, the argons may be monstrous horrors from another dimension, but you have to admire their knack for botany.

I wish you could stay, but while you were out, we got a message from Soulsurge Chamber. They need your help.
Don't worry. The horns are safe to touch. Just don't eat them.

I'm glad you're here, .

The argons are corruptive to body, mind, and soul, and we're just on the edge of learning how they transform life so utterly.
